entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. High minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 28 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
